Class FilterController

java.lang.Object
control.FilterController
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilterManagementController
public class FilterController extends Object implements FilterManagementController
The FilterController class manages the application and resetting of filter criteria for users in the BTO Management System. Interface implemented: - FilterManagementController
